meanings.definition: More lively or energetic in a way that is characteristic of sports.
meanings.sent1: The cheerleading squad looked even sportier in their new uniforms.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team's captain was considered the sportier player on the field.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy seemed to be even sportier than the kids playing in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sportier as a sprinter racing towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The music at the game was so lively, it made the atmosphere even sportier.

meanings.definition: More stylish or fashionable in a way that is characteristic of sports.
meanings.sent1: The new sneakers were sportier than any other shoes in the store.
meanings.sent2: She always wore the sportier outfits to the gym to feel confident.
meanings.sent3: The sportier sunglasses made him look like a fashionable athlete.
meanings.sent4: Her sportier hairstyle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The sportier backpack was a hit among the students for its trendy design.
